title: Dua For Whom Was Cursed
description: Authentic supplications for Dua For Whom Was Cursed
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Dua For Whom Was Cursed. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 230
items.arabic: قَالَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم: ((اللَّهُمَّ فَأَيُّمَا مُؤْمِنٍ سَبَبْتُهُ فَاجْعَلْ ذَلِكَ لَهُ قُرْبَةً إِلَيْكَ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ)).
